rows.label: tlk70000062_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Have you already been to the Iiran
capital city?

rows.label: tlk70000062_04_msg0002
rows.name:
The palace gardens there are famous.
I heard they were designed by the first
king of Iira himself.

rows.label: tlk70000062_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Seems like the idea was to remind
people that we're all a part of nature,
reliant on the Divine Beasts.

rows.label: tlk70000062_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I can't say much about the gardens'
value from an artistic point of view, but
I can get behind that kind of mindset.
